import React, { useState } from 'react' import { ITEM_COLORS } from '../values/colors.js' import Tooltip from './UI/tooltip/Tooltip.jsx' function Item(props) { const color = ITEM_COLORS[props.item.quality] return (
props.choseItem(props.item)}>
{props.item.name}
{props.item.html_tooltip}
) } export default Item
